title: Weird West Review
description:
Weird West is an immersive sim, RPG, twin stick shooter...something, from ex-Arkane developers. With the definitive edition out and done it's a perfect time for a review.
Support the channel at: https://www.patreon.com/mandaloregaming or https://www.paypal.me/mandaloregaming
I take video suggestions at mandaloremovies@gmail.com
Twitter: https://twitter.com/Lord_Mandalore
